d.Name: SAP S/4HANA Integration with Coupa
d.Description:
Coupa Accelerator for SAP S/4HANA delivers a fully pre-configured integration solution to help you replicate supplier from S/4 HANA to Coupa.

Realizing new potential

Leveraging Coupa Accelerator for SAP S/4HANA can help your organization achieve a number of possible benefits, such as:

  • Faster deployment of Coupa solutions.
  • Significant reduction in your overall project timeline for procure to pay transformation.
  • Reduced integration costs.
  • Reduced IT complexity thanks to a preconfigured cloud-to-ERP solution.
  • Other cloud-related benefits, including cost savings, scalability, and timely access to software updates
  • Greater, more timely information transparency to support strategic decision-making.

Integration Flows

This package includes integration flows that support the following integration use-cases: 

  • Replicate Suppliers from SAP S/4HANA to Coupa.

Version supported: SAP S/4HANA 1909 and above.
